title: Looking for a team manager
body: Hi was wondering if any manager reading this knows aussie jamster?

replies.body: Thanks for the comment kaze. Sorry for the long wait time. Was expecting a long wait time for a reply. Ill add you on skype

Hi there I have experience in both coaching and managing teams please find all my details below:

IGN: Kazehaya Shouta (NA)
KazehayaShota (EUW)

Strengths as a Coach: Strict and very efficient at spotting every single mistake.

What will you bring to the team: a high level of understanding macro play after year of studying the highest level.

Why do you want to join: I quit work recently pursuing a career in professional league of legends and would love to help out.

Have you worked with any other teams?: I was the head coach for an EUW master tier team.

Do you get "toxic" at times: Only when players show lack of improvement and don't show that they are listening to what I am saying.


Management experience: I have manage the Top 6 EU Call of Duty console team and many other high placing console teams before moving over to PC.



Anything else you want to say: please add me on skype to discuss further details: alex.hirst7
